name: Alexis Johnson
text: We ordered from Toppers on Marion Road a few days ago while we were staying at a local hotel. We ordered one large pizza and an order of Buffalo Chicken Mac. We had a coupon, so we got the mac and cheese for free. Our delivery guy was very …More

name: Justin King
text: Was and have been on hold for over thirty mins. And still have had no service.  Fix your online bug. Or get better workers at night. Very disappointed.  Next time I'll order from boss pizza  not as good of a deal there but at least they …More

name: Jake Leclair
text: Toppers is always solid

name: Ben H
text: Very friendly people, ample toppings, perfectly made pizza, but I just don't like it. I've had a pizza at the Minnesota store and the Marion store, and their pizza just doesn't taste good to me. This time I ordered a buffalo chicken pizza, …More

name: LeShea Avery
text: Delicious crust and tasty toppings! Staff were very friendly and helpful! Wish we could have this pizza every time! Best pizza in Sioux Falls!!

name: Teresa Meier
text: I'm not sure what was going on that day, but there was one person working and he didn't know what to do. It was 4:30 in the afternoon, one would think they would be better staffed for that time of day. We left without any food. I thought …More

name: Bill vanbeek
text: Great place. The guy working there is super cool and gave me a free sample of a cupcake shake. Highly recommended!

name: Pog2k12
text: Great pizza when they can make a pie right.  Not sure what is so hard about making a Buffalo Chicken pizza with the buffalo sauce on the side but it seems beyond their skill level.

name: Alexa Keller
text: So happy they're on the west side now!  Great food and staff!!  Get the original stix, AMAZING.

name: Denelle Quail
text: So happy that Toppers is on the west side!!!  Love their pizza!  Great staff and fun atmosphere.

name: R S
text: Very tasty pizza the large selection of different dipping sauces is nice. We order pizza from them 3 or 4 times a month.

name: Gage Herrmann
text: It's alright. A little too bready. There is MUCH better pizza in town. Try Fiero, Tomacelli's, or Pizza Man instead.

name: Dominic Mickelson
text: Expecting lots of toppings, but a 2" ring around each pie.   The dough is boring.   Too many other choices in the area that are so much better.   Save your money and time.   Give it less than a year.

name: Matthew Snyder
text: I've had the same pizza from the marion road and Minnesota ave, Minnesota ave one is by far way better when i just got the pizza from the marion road one is ok but i was expecting amazing pizza, if you want great toppers go to the Minnesota ave one

name: The Miller
text: Absolutely terrible on so many levels. Ingredient quality, freshness, overall taste are all an all time low. If you want similar quality put a Little Caesers pizza and breadsticks in the fridge for a few days and re-heat it. Worst in Sioux Falls by far.

name: David Burgfechtel
text: Ordered for pick up. It was ready right on time and delicious.

name: Adrienne Horsley
text: Definitely fast and convient location. Grabbed dessert right next door at the same time!

name: Josiah Ketcham
text: Great food! Lively team members, fast service and fun people to order from!

name: Evan Wilson
text: Best buffalo chicken pizza in town!

name: Kyle karcher
text: They flat out stole my money, pizza was never delivered then when I was told they canceled my charge they decided to charge me days later then tell me theirs nothing they can do. Done with toppers!

name: Tim Lee
text: Awesome pizza fast friendly service if I could give it 100 stars I would

name: Joshua Beckley
text: Great Chicken got to try garlic and hot buff sauce mixed if you like it hot. We get it every time...

name: Fred F
text: Toppers has really good za!

name: Jessica Sowl
text: Hand tossed pizzas, many sauce bases to choose from and so many toppings!

name: Vonda Vander Woude
text: Best mac and cheese

name: MATTHEW LITTLE
text: It was alright not really that great

name: Bert Sheppard
text: Large pizza more the size of a med.

name: Kristin Jensen
text: Buffalo chicken pizza. Enough said.

name: Chad Hatch
text: Best pizza!
